overview: Gill and Lakha, two childhood friends fall for the same girl Maahi. On the other side of the village, Jagga has vowed to make her his wife. Maahi`s parents force her to marry Jagga but Gill intrudes the ceremony and takes her with him. Jagga is livid and animosity brews between him and Maahi`s family, which make a desperate effort to kill Lakha.
title: Jaan To Pyara
